content.div: The EXDE project, which aimed to continue supporting gnome 2.X is dead. This is really a shame continue reading...

entry.title: Quicktip - Setting keyboard layout in GNOME via CLI

content.div: Of course backups could do the job, but I find a clean install much cleaner and safer for my purposes. continue reading...

entry.title: The more I read on GNOME 3 I get more mad

content.div: The idea I need to learn X Programming Language (e.g. JavaScript) in order to customize my desktop is IMHO simply IDIOTIC! Although I love learning programming languages, and I am a programmer, I DON'T WANT to program my desktop. My desktop is not a problem I need to solve. It should just work. continue reading...
